channel.title: rifles on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in rifles on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Rifle Camp
item.description: (transcribed 9:30pm HST Tuesday 18 February 2003) (adapted from Book One of my diary) Friday July 9, 1987 4:20P.M. Rifle camp was great- There were about 8 guys, including instructors and over 100 girls! I had fun! The first day, Sunday we left Tomball at 8:30AM. We got there at about 2PM. We registered- I got a key for my room. We went up to our rooms and scoped the place out.
